text: Iris West is a fictional character, a supporting character appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics. She has been the main love interest and later wife of Barry Allen / The Flash. == In other media == On television, Candice Patton plays her in the 2014 The CW television series. In the DC Extended Universe, Kiersey Clemons plays the character. ==References== Category:Fictional characters introduced in the 1950s Category:DC Comics characters
title: Iris West
